title: Role Responsible for Account Type Definition and Review
summary: The specific job title or group responsible for formally defining what types of accounts are allowed/prohibited and for reviewing these definitions periodically.

title: Core System Security Tool Name
summary: The primary software or system used to manage security and access control on a central or critical system platform.

title: Directory Service Name
summary: The enterprise's main directory service for identities and authentication.

title: Application Role Definition Mechanism
summary: The method or technology used within applications to define internal roles and permissions.

title: Review Frequency for Account Type Definitions
summary: How often definitions of allowed/prohibited account types are reviewed.

title: Default User Account Manager
summary: The standard role typically assigned responsibility for a user's account.

title: Default Service Account Manager
summary: The standard role typically assigned responsibility for a non-human account.

title: IAM Solution Name
summary: The enterprise-wide system for identity lifecycle and access management.

title: Reviewing Role for Manager Assignments
summary: The role responsible for verifying account manager assignments.

title: Frequency of Manager Assignment Review
summary: How often account manager assignments are formally reviewed.
examples: As part of user access reviews

title: Role Defining Membership Prerequisites
summary: The role establishing criteria for group or role membership.

title: Service Management Platform Name
summary: The system for managing IT service requests, incidents, and changes.

title: Frequency of Prerequisite Verification
summary: How often fulfillment of prerequisites for group/role membership is re-verified.

title: Role Specifying Authorizations and Memberships
summary: The role defining specific access rights and group/role assignments.

title: Approving Roles for Account Creation
summary: The roles required to approve new user account creation.

title: Approving Roles for Sensitive Access
summary: Specific roles required to approve access to highly sensitive data or systems.

title: Role Approving Application Access
summary: The role responsible for approving user access to specific applications.

title: Directory Service Automation Interface
summary: The scripting language, API, or toolset for automating directory service tasks.

title: Core System Security Tool Commands
summary: Specific command language for security on the core system.

title: Role Performing Manual Lifecycle Actions
summary: The role manually executing account lifecycle tasks when automation fails or isn't used.

title: HR System Name
summary: The enterprise's Human Resources information system.

title: Role Monitoring Account Usage/Alerts
summary: The role actively monitoring account activity logs and responding to alerts.

title: Attributes for System Access
summary: User, account, or device attributes used for authorizing system access.

title: Timeframe for Disabling Accounts
summary: The defined period within which accounts must be disabled after a triggering event.

title: SIEM Tool Name
summary: The Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) tool used for log aggregation and analysis.

title: Frequency of Alert Review
summary: How often security alerts (e.g., from SIEM) are reviewed by responsible personnel.

title: Notified Roles for Account Status Changes
summary: Personnel or roles to be notified upon account status changes (creation, modification, disablement).

title: Notification Timeframe for Account Changes
summary: The period within which notifications about account changes must be sent.

title: Role Defining Intended System Usage
summary: The role responsible for defining and documenting the intended and authorized uses of the system for different user roles.

title: Standard Account Review Frequency
summary: How often standard user accounts are reviewed for continued need and appropriate access.

title: Privileged Account Review Frequency
summary: How often privileged accounts (admin, service) are reviewed.

title: Reviewing/Attesting Roles for Accounts
summary: The roles responsible for performing and attesting to user access reviews.

title: Access Certification Tool Name
summary: The tool used to conduct and manage user access certification campaigns.

title: Role Managing Shared Account Authenticators
summary: The role responsible for managing and changing authenticators for shared or group accounts.

title: PAM Solution Name
summary: The Privileged Access Management (PAM) solution used for controlling and monitoring privileged accounts.

title: Timeframe for Disabling/Removing Access for Leavers
summary: The maximum time allowed to disable or remove access for personnel who have left the organization.

title: Timeframe for Modifying Access for Movers
summary: The maximum time allowed to review and adjust access for personnel who have transferred roles.
examples: Within 3 business days of role change
Prior to new role start date

title: Application Platform Name
summary: The primary platform or environment where key applications are hosted (can be general if not specific to App Role Mechanism).
